# Extendicare## PROCEDURE**MANUAL:** Environmental Services
**INDEX:** EVS2-P10.09B
**SECTION:** Cleaning and Organization - Housekeeping
**DESCRIPTION:** Baseboard Cleaning
**EFFECTIVE DATE:** March 18, 2025
**REVIEWED DATE:** March 7, 2025
**APPROVED BY:** Senior Director, Operational Quality and Professional Practice
**MODIFIED DATE:** May 14, 2025----## POLICY### Cleaning and Organization## PROCEDURE- Clean the baseboards on a frequency that will provide sanitation and preserve the surfaces.### Collect the following supplies:
- bottle with stripper solution
- bottle with all-purpose cleaner
- scraper
- doodlebug or baseboard cleaning equipment
- bucket with clean water
- clean cloths### WASHING BASEBOARDS:
- Wipe with all-purpose cleaner. - Scrub with doodlebug or baseboard cleaning tool. - Scrape hard soils with scraper. - Rinse with clean water. - Dry with cloth. - Remove all excess water left on the floor.### STRIPPING BASEBOARDS:
- Apply stripper solution. Protect floor with old blanket. - Wait a few minutes for the solution to soften floor finish. Up to 5-10 minutes for heavy build-up. - Scrub with doodlebug or baseboard cleaning tool. - Use scraper to remove heavy build-up.

- Scrub with doodlebug or baseboard cleaning tool. - Use scraper to remove heavy build-up. - Rinse with clean water and wipe dry. - Remove all excess water left on the floor.----**This document is uncontrolled when printed.**
Extendicare (Canada) Inc. will provide, on request, information in an accessible format or with communication supports to people with disabilities, in a manner that takes into account their disability. Confidential and Proprietary Information of Extendicare (Canada) Inc. Â© 2025
